v.v: How fortunate are those who provide for the poor;
Yahweh will protect them and allow them to live for a long time.
When they are sick, Yahweh will strengthen them
When I was sick, I said, “Yahweh, act mercifully toward me and heal me;
My enemies say cruel things about me;
When my enemies come to me, they pretend to be concerned about me.
All those who hate me whisper to others about me,
They say, “He will soon die because of his being sick;
Even a very close friend, whom I trusted very much,
But Yahweh, act mercifully to me, and enable me to become healthy again.
If you enable me to do that, with the result that my enemies do not defeat me,
I will know that it is because I have done what is right that you have helped me,
Praise Yahweh, the God whom we Israelites worship;

v: Yahweh will rescue those people when they have troubles.
He will enable them to be happy in the land of Israel
and will rescue them from their enemies.
I know that I am sick because I have sinned against you.”
they say, “How soon will he die, and then everyone will forget about him?”
They eagerly listen to all the bad news about me.
Then they go away and tell everyone what is happening to me.
and they hope that very bad things will happen to me.
he will never get up from his bed before he dies.”
When you do that, I will be able to pay back my enemies.
I will know that you are pleased with me.
and I will know that you will enable me to be with you forever.
Amen! I desire that it will be so!
